=== Native Non-Free Ubuntu Games ===

These are in the multiverse repository

''' Glest '''
----
<nowiki>[[File:glest.png]]</nowiki>

Glest  is a free 3D real time strategy game the current version includes single player game against AI controlled players, providing two factions for the player to control: Magic and Tech, each with their corresponding tech trees, units and buildings.

* Genre : RTS
* Homepage : http://www.glest.org
* Install Instructions : just <nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware#installing-a-package|install the following package]]</nowiki>: '''''<nowiki>[[apt:glest|glest]]</nowiki>'''''.

''' Tremulous '''
----
<nowiki>[[File:tremulous.jpg]]</nowiki>

A multiplayer First Person Shooter with an emphasis on Human vs Aliens with an element of Real Time Strategy.

* Genre : FPS, RTS
* Multiplayer : Online, Local Network
* Homepage : http://tremulous.net/
* Install Instructions : just <nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware#installing-a-package|install the following package]]</nowiki>: '''''<nowiki>[[apt:tremulous|tremulous]]</nowiki>'''''. If you want to create a game server, also <nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware#installing-a-package|install the following package]]</nowiki>: '''''<nowiki>[[apt:tremulous-server|tremulous-server]]</nowiki>'''''.

''' Ur-Quan Masters '''
----
<nowiki>[[File:ur-quan.jpg]]</nowiki>

You return to Earth with a vessel built from technology discovered from an ancient race called the Precursors only to find it enslaved. Gather allies from a wide variety of races, engage in space combat with various foes, and save the galaxy from the Ur-Quan!
The Ur-Quan Masters is derived from the classic game Star Control II. It includes both the adventure game described above and a fast-paced Super Melee.

* Genre : Space Fighter
* Homepage : http://sc2.sourceforge.net/
* Install Instructions : just <nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware#installing-a-package|install the following package]]</nowiki>: '''''<nowiki>[[apt:uqm|uqm]]</nowiki>'''''.
